1.0.name: wordpress/e-webface-sistema-para-a-gravacao-de-videoconferencias
1.0.description:
e-WebFace is an web conferencing system. This plugin integrates e-WebFace into WordPress allowing bloggers to create and manage meetings rooms to interact with their readers.

For more information on setting up your own e-WebFace server or for using an external hosting provider visit http://e-WebFace.com
